task.shortdesc: Make sure that you do not cook the eggs too soon or they will get cold.

prereq.p: This is what you will need to make the eggs
You should have already cooked the bacon and the sausage.

Gather all of the following:
Small glass bowl (in the cabinet next to the fridge) <li

step.cmd: Crack as many eggs as you want in the bowl. Four is a recommended number just so that you can make more than one burrutio - in case I come home.
Whisk the eggs until they are a consistant color and consistency. more bubbles make them fluffier
This is the place to add lots of cheese if you want it in the burritos.
